attributes.action: make it cheaper to eat healthy food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If healthy/ organic food is meant to be really good for us, surely they should make it cheaper so that it would be more attractive to buy? I think the trend of more people being overweight could be linked to the number of unhealthy foods at low prices. Answer: make healthy foods cheaper, and unhealthy foods more expensive, then if you want to eat junk you pay extra. (this would hit me quite a bit as I eat a lot of junk food... but its better in the long run)
